data.name: NYC SUG Monthly meetups 2019
data.description:
- - - -
6:00 - Arrivals and networking / 6:30 - Group exercise The NYC Scrum User Group meets monthly to talk about Scrum, to share experiences, to network, and to provide support for local Scrum practitioners. Interested in telling your own story? If you have an idea you would like to share, come…

relatedRecords.name: Future Developer Summit 2019
relatedRecords.description: An invite-only, Director-level network where the developer marketing leaders debate best practices, learn and design better developer strategies. The event brings together 60 Director/VP/GM-level thought leaders in developer marketing to share experiences.
